snippet: In a small, preliminary study, an experimental vaccine provoked a strong immune response against precancerous cells in women treated for early signs of cervical cancer.
lead_paragraph: In a small, preliminary study, an experimental vaccine provoked a strong immune response against precancerous cells in women treated for early signs of cervical cancer.

headline.seo: Therapeutic Vaccine Shows Potential in Fighting Cervical Cancer
headline.main: Therapeutic Vaccine Shows Potential in Fighting Cervical Cancer
headline.print_headline: Therapeutic Vaccine Shows Potential in Fighting Cervical Cancer
